short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arceus X Extention provides you customized background to your new tab For aloha browser lovers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arceus X chrome theme can easily change your New chrome Tab Color and New tab background.

Your New Chrome Tab Color and New Tab Background can be customized with the Arceus X theme extension for Chrome.

How to Use this theme?

1. Firstly click on the "Add to Chrome" button.
2. After Installed just click on "Extension Icon"
3. After Click you can see full Digital music distributor theme color in your PC.
4. Let's Enjoy.

Thanks.
